title: 3 Bed/2 Bath Home with Roofdeck and Patio Across from Community Garden
description:
Welcome Home! This well-maintained 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom single-family home with a patio AND roof deck in desirable the Queen Village neighborhood has it all! Located on a low-traffic, charming block across from a blooming community garden, you can pull your car in front of the house to unload your groceries with ease. Natural cork flooring and recessed lighting throughout the open concept downstairs living space. The kitchen features granite countertops with breakfast bar, blown-glass pendant lights, stainless steel appliances, garbage disposal, ample cabinet space with under-cabinet lighting, a gas cooktop, and glass tile backsplash. Sliding doors off the kitchen allow for cool breezes, lots of natural light, and easy access to the side patio for grilling and relaxing. Upstairs on the second floor is a large front bedroom with cork flooring, ceiling fan, and recessed lighting, a modern full bathroom with tile shower and bathtub, and a second bedroom with ceiling fan and a built-in closet unit. Both bedrooms get excellent natural light. Conveniently located 2nd floor laundry closet, complete with washer, brand new Miele ventless dryer, and ample shelving. As you make your way to the third floor, you will notice that the skylight above the stairwell allows for natural light to shine throughout the home. On the third floor is the spacious and bright main bedroom with built-in closet units, track lighting, ceiling fan, newly renovated master bathroom with sleek fixtures, large vanity and tiled shower with rain-shower system, and access out to the new, spacious private TREX roof deck, with outdoor outlets, where you can enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. Leave the deck door open for a fabulous night of sleep with a cross-breeze! Finished basement with laminate wood flooring offers additional space for a playroom, home office, or workout space, with crawl space for additional storage. Ceiling fans in all rooms keep the home cool in the summertime and energy bills low. Central heating and air conditioning throughout the home. On-street parking. Heating/AC unit, patio doors, ceiling fans and all windows recently replaced for energy efficiency.
Amazing block, neighbors, and neighborhood! Located in Nebinger School catchment. Walking distance to shops, restaurants, nightlife, East Passyunk neighborhood, Old City, Italian Market, Center City, Jefferson, Pennsylvania hospital, grocery stores, library, parks, playgrounds, pools, public transportation, Penn's Landing, Nebinger School, and more.
Schedule a showing today!

title: 3 bedroom, living room, dining room, 1.5 baths
description:
Large 3 bedroom, living room, dining room, 1 baths with GARDEN and PORCH on a very nice block in Graduate Hospital/Center City West is available for rent starting August 1st.
The first floor has high ceilings, wonderful natural light, a large living room with fireplace, which opens to a dining room and kitchen. The kitchen boasts new wood cabinets, granite counter tops, stainless steel oven, dishwasher and microwave. There is a half bath with natural light on the 1st floor. The laundry/dryer closet is also located on the 1st floor. The second floor consists of three bedrooms and a full bath, as well as a hall closet. Closet organization systems were installed in the bedroom closets. The hardwood floor was beautifully restored throughout the entire house, reminiscent of the Victorian era.
There are central air and ceiling fans in all rooms. The large basement is suitable to all your storage needs. Enjoy a BBQ with your friends on the back patio/porch with garden.
Excellent location in Graduate Hospital! Walking distance to the Schuylkill River Trail, Rittenhouse Square, PENN, CHOP, I76, Amtrak, Sprouts Farmers Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Fitzwater Street Philly bagels, The Sidecar Bar, Jinxed, Dock Street Brewery, Ultimo Cafe, Starbucks, Giant, shopping, gym, parks and playgrounds, and numerous restaurants.

title: Newly Renovated Ultra Lux Apartment In Society Hill!
description:
Reply to this listing for more information.

Property Details:
- 200 Locust St
- 1 Br
- 1 Ba
- 728 Sqrft
- $3,700/mo
______________________________________
Newly renovated, ultra-luxurious 1 bed, 1 bath apartment overflowing with modern design elements that mirror the pages of an architectural magazine. Complementing the home's distinctive character are floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the Delaware River, in-unit laundry, and a fantastic location steps from dining, shopping, and entertainment. This fully amenitized building offers a welcome desk and security staffed 24/7, a fitness center, a brand-new saltwater pool, garage parking, and all utilities with basic cable are included in the rent. The unit's main living space is bright, open, and airy, with high ceilings trimmed by black crown molding. Stepping inside, you're immediately taken by the centerpiece of the apartment—a wall of windows showcasing picturesque views of the Delaware River, perfect for holiday firework displays, and providing tons of natural light. The entry features hexagon tile floors that uniquely transition into beautiful hardwoods. The sleek kitchen is fitted with white shaker-style cabinetry, black countertops, high-end stainless steel appliances, a tile backsplash, and a breakfast bar. Anchoring the living room is a towering fireplace flanked by built-ins. Picture frame molding on the walls add visual interest, while a built-in desk nook aids function. On the other side of the home, you'll find the hotel-like primary suite. The bedroom has more massive windows, a tile feature wall, and a built-in desk with cabinetry. There's also a walk-in closet, a laundry area with a LG Styler Steam Closet, and a spa-like full bathroom adorned with designer tile and a glass-enclosed rainfall shower that features sprayer jets. Other highlights include a huge private separate storage unit with custom racks, Hunter Douglas custom shades, and smart-home functionality. In addition to everything inside, this unbeatable location earns a Walk Score of 98! James Beard Awarded Zahav restaurant is sat on the grounds, while Positano Coast and Landmark's Ritz Five theater are across the street. There's history to explore at Independence Mall, nightlife in Old City, and riverfront entertainment at Penn's Landing, all a short stroll away. There's also easy access to Pennsylvania and Jefferson Hospitals, Center City, Delaware Ave, I-95, and South Jersey.

Welcome to 323 S 17th St! This is a 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom top floor condominium in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! Features include hardwood floors, high ceilings, decorative fireplace, built-in bookshelves, in-unit laundry, central air, and vintage charm everywhere! Enter into a small entry area with your in-unit washer and dryer. Up a few stairs leads you pass the kitchen and into the large living area with high ceiling and big windows for abundant sunlight. The living room offers an open floor plan with a decorative fireplace bordered by built-in shelving. The space flows back nicely into the formal dining area with plenty of space for a full dining set. Head into the beautiful kitchen equipped with minimalistic cabinetry, blue subway tile backsplash, granite countertops, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, refrigerator, gas range, and built-in microwave. Continue upstairs with your 1st bedroom which is sizable with built-in shelving, several closets, and an attached full bathroom. There's a custom-built window separating the bedroom from the living room below that lends noise reduction, and the room can also double as a spacious office with an optional whiteboard mounted to the wall. Off of the hall is another full bathroom showcasing a shower / tub combo and a smaller bedroom with a wardrobe that will remain with the home. The primary bedroom is at the back featuring a decorative marble fireplace, 2 closets, and sliding glass doors that lead out to your private balcony - perfect for the warmer months! Schedule your tour today! Please note that the following items can remain with the rental or be removed upon request: the grill and the large whiteboard in the upstairs bedroom/office.
Located in the beautiful Rittenhouse neighborhood and surrounded by nonstop shopping, eatery, and entertainment options. You'll be walking distance to City Hall and Suburban Station for easy access to the entire city and beyond! Close to Rittenhouse Square, Broad Street, Market Street, and iconic South Street. Check out favorite hotspots like the Suzanne Roberts Theater, Barclay Prime, Monk's Cafe, Parc, Kimmel Cultural Campus, Jose Pistola's, Volver, and countless more! Lease Terms:
